phase_prompt: The goal is to find all requirements in the job description.
Note that we must ONLY discuss the requirements described in the job description and do not discuss anything else!

Once we all have expressed our opinion(s) and agree with the results of the discussion unanimously, any of us must actively terminate the discussion by replying with only one line, which starts with a single word <INFO>, followed by our final list of requirements without any other words, e.g., "<INFO> CFO experience, English language knowledge".
The goal is to score the CV.
Note that we must ONLY discuss the score and do not discuss anything else!

Once we all have expressed our opinion(s) and agree with the results of the discussion unanimously, any of us must actively terminate the discussion by replying with only one line, which starts with a single word <INFO>, followed by our final scores without any other words, e.g., "<INFO> 39 ".
